|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCI, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, heatsink, fan, metal case |addchip = USB 2.0 Hub Controller;NEC;Î¼PD720114;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;TI;SN47LV08;;2;,,, 3A Source/Sink DDR terminator Regulator;TI;TPS51100;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Micrel;MIC2076;;1;,,, 5V Dual Trip Point Temperature Sensor;Microchip;TC620;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Diodes Inc;DMN3033LSDQ;;6;,,, Programmable 3-PLL VCXO Clock Synthesizer;TI;CDCE937;;1;,,, 256Kbit I2C-Compatible Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256C;;1;,,, USB 2.0 SD/MMC Flash Card Reader IC;Genesys Logic;GL823;;1;,,, I2C 32-Bit Binary Counter Watchdog RTC;Dallas Semiconductor;DS1374;;1;,,, +5V Powered Multichannel RS232 Driver/Receiver;Maxim Integrated;MAX232A;;1;,,, Low Voltage Hex Inverter w/5V Tolerant Schmitt Trigger Input;Fairchild;74LCX14;;3;,,, Dual 2-Phase Synchronous Step-Down Switching Controller;Analog Devices;LTC3850;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn

|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/28/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833339198 |asin = B007HIM6PK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = EnGenius EMP-7601 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-TNC, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|SonicWALL}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN5020 Dual-core [[MIPS64]] (@500MHz) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB NOR Flash *Network: 7x Gigabit Ethernet port *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9160 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *USB: 2x USB 2.0 host ports *Power: 12V, 3A via two-prong connector
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:SonicWALL TZ 215W Top.jpeg|Top File:SonicWALL TZ 215W Bottom.jpeg|Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
